projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Classification of Documents Using KNN
projects.bodyText:
- An innovative project that integrates graph theory and machine learning. 
 - By leveraging graph representations of documents and (KNN) algorithm.

projects.title: Expense-Tracker-Apps
projects.bodyText:
- The expense tracker app, developed using React.js and styled-components 
 - It provides a responsive and user-friendly interface for real-time managements.

projects.title: Recipe App
projects.bodyText:
- The recipe app built with Flutter offers a sleek and responsive interface for browsing, searching, and saving your favorite recipes.
 - It utilizes Flutter's cross-platform capabilities to deliver a consistent user experience on both iOS and Android devices.
 - Uses **Firebase** database to store recipies.

projects.title: Object Detction Using Tensorflow
projects.bodyText:
- Object detection using TensorFlow trains models to identify and locate objects in images or videos.
 - It leverages TensorFlow's neural network libraries for accurate, real-time recognition and classification.

projects.title: object-detection
projects.bodyText:
- Developed an object detection system using TensorFlow, capable of accurately identifying and localizing multiple objects in real-time. 
 - Implemented convolutional neural networks (CNNs) to enhance detection accuracy and efficiency for various applications, such as surveillance and autonomous vehicles.
